channel.title: -Webclient Error- URGENTLY NEEDS HELPZ
channel.description:
I'm trying to make a webclient at my website and this is what I did. 1. Make the client.jar 2. Upload it to host (.webs) 3. Make a webclient page 4. On the webclient page put this:
<HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE>TragedyScape Webclient</TITLE> <META HTTP-EQUIV="PRAGMA" CONTENT="NO-CACHE"> </HEAD>
<BODY>
<applet name="Tragedy Webclient" width="765" height="503" archive="Client.jar" code="client.class"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m"> </applet>
</BODY> </HTML>
I know there isn't anything wrong with the .jar, I can play fine by double clicking it. It's the webclient that's the problem. It tells me it cant find client.class or something and says error loading (not in the client window, in a java window. the client won't even load.)
thanx in advance

item.title: -Webclient Error- URGENTLY NEEDS HELPZ
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

[quote=“Mee0345, post:5, topic:449871”]DO NOT USE WEBS.COM! It is SHIT!
If you want your server to really succeed, I recommend getting a webhost.
A pro webhost:
x10hosting.com[/quote]
Thats what im using. Besides for the small ammount of resources you get per hour, its incredible.

Read full topic
